title: 今天的微小改变，会带来全然不同的明天。
content: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.

title: 你不应该去评判你不了解的事物。
content: You should never judge something you don't understand.

title: 让胸中之火燃烧，不管多微弱，不管藏得有多深。
content: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.

title: 卓越的人的一大优点是：在不利和艰难的遭遇里百折不挠。
content: A major advantage of the remarkable people is: perseverance in the adverse and difficult encounter.

title: 因了解树，我懂得何谓耐心。因了解草，我才能欣赏坚持。
content: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.

title: 生命是上天的馈赠，我不想虚度年华。
content: I figure life is a gift and I don't intend on wasting it.

title: 坠入爱河这事儿，你可不能怪地心引力。
content: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.

title: 如果你知道自己想追求什么，就很容易成功。
content: It's easy to find if you know what you're looking for.

title: 输掉比赛没什么丢脸的，但是因为怕输就放弃比赛，才是最丢脸的。
content: There's no dishonor in losing the race, there's only dishonor in not race because you're afraid to lose.

title: 我决定去爱，恨是难以承受的负担。
content: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.

title: 印刷成文的不一定就是真理。
content: Just because it's in print doesn't mean it's the gospel.

title: 不要安于现状；开创未来并让人生变得更好。
content: Do not settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.

title: 我不会说“别哭”，因为并非所有眼泪都是不幸。
content: I will not say "Do not weep" , for not all tears are an evil.

title: 我们要以高涨的信心和喷涌的力量去战斗。
content: We shall fight with growing confidence and growing strength in the air.

title: 机遇就像晨光，稍纵即逝。
content: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.

title: 如果我们不结束战争，被终结的将是我们自己。
content: If we don't end war, war will end us.

title: 每个人都会有缺陷，就像被上帝咬过的苹果。
content: Everyone has his disadvantages, like the apple bitten by God.

title: 痛苦分两种，一种让你变得更强，另一种毫无价值，只是徒增折磨。
content: There are two kinds of pain: the sort of pain that makes you strong or useless pain, the sort of pain that's only suffering.

title: 在变幻的生命里，岁月，原来是最大的小偷。
content: And in the end, the greatest thief of all is time.

title: 我只愿早上起来成为一个比入睡前更好的人。
content: To simply wake up every morning a better person than when I went to bed.

title: 追求卓越，成功自然来。
content: Pursue excellence and success will follow.

title: 有时，弱点反而是我们最强的武器。
content: Sometimes vulnerability can be our greatest weapon.

title: 我们就是您创作的旋律和音符。我们是您人生的乐章。
content: We are the melodies and the notes of your opus. We are the music of your life.

title: 不管明天将带来什么，我都会感激。
content: Whatever tomorrow brings, I'm grateful to see it.

title: 烈火见真金，逆境出英雄。
content: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.

title: 你不主导命运，就会被命运主导。
content: If you don't make a choice, the choice makes you.

title: 我们中有些人注定要在日常生活的点滴中寻找生命存在的意义。
content: Some of us may just have to find meaning in the little moments that make up life.

title: 何处最伤心，关山见秋月。
content: My heart laments at the sight of the autumn moon above the mountain pass.

title: 万物皆有使命，即使机器也有。
content: Everything has a purpose, even machine.

title: 真正的力量不是推倒别人，而是将摔倒的人扶起来。
content: Real strength doesn't come from pushing other people down. It's from lifting them up.

title: 能够想象任何事的人，可以创造不可能。
content: Those who can imagine anything, can create the impossible.

title: 去做能让你开心的事，人生最重要的是满足自己。
content: Do the thing that makes you happy. Life is about feeding your soul.

title: 一盎司的行动抵得上一吨的理论。
content: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.

title: 别人给的机会若不抓住，很快就会错失。
content: What is given can quickly be taken away.

title: 雾气洋溢、果实圆熟的秋，你和成熟的太阳成为友伴。
content: Season of mists and mellow fruitfulness, close bosom-friend of the maturing sun.

title: 不要以时钟，而是以罗盘來指引你的人生。
content: Live your life by a compass, not a clock.

title: 我看到的都是表象，最重要的东西肉眼是看不见的。
content: What I see here is nothing but a shell. What is most important is what is invisible.

title: 沉着、勇猛，有辨别，不自私。
content: Calm, brave, discerning, not selfish.

title: 被不确定所困扰的人，是无法专注在成功的道路上的。
content: A mind troubled by doubt cannot focus on the course to victory.

title: 天大烦恼，一个深呼吸就什么都没了。
content: Just take one deep breath, and all trouble will disappear.

title: 君子耻其言而过其行。
content: A gentleman would be ashamed should his deeds not match his words.

title: 做每件事情都用尽你的全力，只使出一半力气绝对无法做到位。
content: All that you do, do with your might; things done by halves are never done right.

title: 战胜怀疑与恐惧的人，已经战胜了失败。
content: He who has conquered doubt and fear has conquered failure.

title: 但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。
content: I only pray our life be long, and our souls together heavenward fly!

title: 享受人生旅程而不仅是关注结果。
content: Enjoy the journey of life and not just the endgame.

title: 焦虑不能清空明天的问题，只会消除今天的力气。
content: Worrying does not empty tomorrow of its troubles; it empties today of its strength.

title: 对虚幻的信仰能抚慰人类的心，但也同样会令其软弱。
content: Belief in the unreal can comfort the human mind, but it also weakens it.

title: 活着就是为了改变世界，难道还有其他原因吗？
content: We're here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?

title: 即使最聪明的人也还有要学习的。
content: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.

title: 开创生活，而不是维持生命，这才是生命真正的主人。
content: True masters are those who have chosen to make a life rather than a living.

title: 在不幸的背后，总是有着奢侈与怠慢。
content: There is always conceit and negligence behind miscount.

title: 让我们面对现实，让我们忠于理想。
content: Let us face the reality, so that we are committed to our ideal.

title: 卓越不是一种技能，而是一种态度。
content: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.

title: 这是“绿洲”世界，在这里唯一限制你的是你自己的想象力。
content: This is the "oasis" world, where the only limit is your own imagination.

title: 问题不能改变事实，但是能够推动改变。
content: Questions can't change the truth. But they give it motion.

title: 完美不是控制出来的，是爆发出来的。
content: Perfection is not just about control. It's also about letting go.

title: 我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。
content: I am a slow walker, but I never walk backwards.

title: 我父亲曾经说过，不管你做什么，都要做到极致。
content: My father used to say, whatever you do, do it a hundred percent.

title: 如果你还不能养活100个人，就从帮助一个人开始。
content: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.

title: 如果自身伟大，任何工作你都不会觉得渺小。
content: You would not think any duty small if you yourself were great.

title: 时间不过是条流经你我过往的河流。
content: Time is but a river flowing from our past.

title: 弱者在决策前迟疑，强者则反之。
content: A weak man has doubts before a decision. A strong man has them afterwards.

title: 若你能爱你的敌人，那你已经取得了胜利。
content: If you can love your enemy, you already have the victory.

title: 目标引领我们成为能够成为的人。
content: Purpose drives the process by which we become what we are capable of being.

title: 人可以被毁灭，但不能被打败。
content: A man can be destroyed but not defeated.

title: 讨论是知识的交流，争论是无知的碰撞。
content: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; argument is an exchange of ignorance.

title: 只要是有意义的事，再晚去做都是有意义的。
content: For what it's worth, it's never too late.

title: 别低估了慷慨的力量。
content: Generosity is its own form of power.

title: 答应自己要坚强，不让任何事物烦扰内心的平静。
content: Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.

title: 如果你知道你的价值，你就前进实现你的价值。
content: Now if you know what you're worth, go and get what you're worth.

title: 我们心底所有美好的感情都凝结在我们对家人的爱里。
content: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family.

title: 请记住，你是能让世界洒满阳光的人。
content: Remember, you're the one who can fill the world with sunshine.

title: 慈善，对于我们不足挂齿，而对他人可能弥足珍贵。
content: The charity that is a trifle to us can be precious to others.

title: 万圣节是个展示创造力的好机会。
content: Halloween is an opportunity to be really creative.

title: 任何值得一做的事，都该把它做好。
content: Whatever is worth doing is worth doing well.

title: 今天的好计划胜过明天的完美计划。
content: A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow.

title: 今天的好计划胜过明天的完美计划。
content: A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow.

title: 死神在向我们每个人微笑，我们所能做的只有回敬微笑。
content: Death smiles at us all. All a man can do is smiles back.

title: 如果你把每件事都推迟到确定以后才做，那你什么都做不成。
content: If you put off everything till you're sure of it, you'll never get anything done.

title: 滚石不生苔。
content: A rolling stone gathers no moss.

title: 如果冬天来了, 春天还会远吗？
content: If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind?

title: 解决任何问题的第一步，是要承认问题的存在。
content: The first step in solving any problem is recognizing there is one.

title: 有时候，正确的道路并不是最轻松的。
content: Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.

title: 一个人评判的愈多，爱的就愈少。
content: The more one judges, the less one loves.

title: 把手握紧，里面什么都没有，但把手张开，就可以拥有一切。
content: There is nothing we can hold onto in this world. Only by letting go can we truly possess what is real.

title: 所有事情在变简单前都是困难的。
content: All things are difficult before they are easy.

title: 勇气，就是即使恐惧仍能继续坚持一分钟。
content: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.

title: 哪怕希望快要破灭，也要努力挣扎，坚持下去。
content: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

title: 如果你不必纠缠过去，那么回忆是一件非常美好的事情。
content: Memory is a wonderful thing if you don't have to deal with the past.

title: 如果你生活漫无目的，那就好像你坏了。
content: If you lose your purpose, it's like you're broken.

title: 人们只有在切身体会过某些情节后，才能理解那些深奥的书。
content: No man understands a deep book until he has seen and lived at least part of its contents.

title: 讽刺是最低级的智慧。
content: Sarcasm is the lowest form of wit.

title: 如果机遇不找过来，就自己造一扇门吧。
content: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

title: 一个人知道自己为什么而活，就可以忍受任何一种生活。
content: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

title: 这相隔千里的来电，至少能让我不留遗憾。
content: Hello from the outside, at least I can say that I've tried to tell you.

title: 我们活着应该尽自己所能给生活创造一些东西，而非一味索取。
content: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.

title: 疯狂和伟大只有一线之隔，他们往往相伴而行。
content: This is either madness or brilliance. It's remarkable how often those two traits coincide.

title: 读书使人充实，讨论使人机智，笔记使人准确。
content: Reading makes a full man, conference a ready man, and writing an exact man.

title: 专注在细节上，答案就在你的眼皮底下。
content: Focus on the details, they've always been in front of our eyes.

title: 我对自己的现状和所拥有的一切心存感激。对我来说每一天都是感恩节。
content: I am grateful for what I am and have. My Thanksgiving is perpetual.

title: 若想死后永垂不朽，首先得活得精彩。
content: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.

title: 只有忘记过去，才能继续前行。
content: You got to put the past behind before you can move on.

title: 哪里没有欲望，哪里就不会有勤奋。
content: Where there is no desire, there will be no industry.

title: 有时候就是要做对的事，哪怕内心万分痛苦。
content: Sometimes it's about doing the right thing, even if it's painful inside.

title: 头脑聪明不代表就能明智地行事。
content: It takes more than intelligence to act intelligently.

title: 每个人的身体都是独立的，但灵魂从来不是。
content: As a body everyone is single, as a soul never.

title: 内心深处的爱意是神圣的。
content: There is a holiness to the heart’s affections.

title: 永远不要让你的坚持和激情变成固执和无知。
content: Never let your persistence and passion turn into stubbornness and ignorance.

title: 最大的沟通问题是，很多人聆听不是为了理解，只是为了回答。
content: The biggest communication problem is we do not listen to understand. We listen to reply.

title: 教育是一个逐步发现自己无知的过程。
content: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.

title: 嘴上一时享受，臀上一世肥肉。
content: A minute on the lips, a lifetime on the hips.

title: 事实上，我们每个人都是血缘关系的。看你在家谱里往回推算多远。
content: The truth is, each of us is related. It's just a question of how far back you traced your family tree.

title: 爱不分年龄，没有限制，永不凋谢。
content: Love has no age, no limit, and no death.

title: 与你内心的力量相比，过往的艰难和未来的挑战都黯然失色。
content: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.

title: 只有恋爱中的人，才会认为他们的相遇不是偶然的。
content: Only people in love believe they were destined to meet.

title: 我们往往记住的不是某一天，而是某个时刻。
content: We do not remember days, we remember moments.

title: 铭记才是治愈的开始。
content: Remembrance is the beginning of healing.

title: 有时生活给你当头痛击，但是别丧失信念。
content: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.

title: 花没有阳光就不能盛开，人没有爱就不能生存。
content: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.

title: 世界是一本书，不旅行的人只读了其中的一页。
content: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.

title: 任何人都可以有咒怨，但是宽恕需要真的勇气。
content: Anyone can hold a grudge, but it takes real courage to forgive.

title: 心动不行动，机会流失中。
content: Get a move on, or all the good ones will have gone.

title: 压垮你的不是那些重担，而是你背负的方式。
content: It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.

title: 旅行可能是最有益的自省方式之一。
content: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.

title: 最终，衡量我们的是内心的勇气。
content: We will all be judged by the courage of our hearts.

title: 制定完美的计划不代表事情会按着计划发生。
content: Just because you make a good plan, doesn't mean that's what's gonna happen.

title: 你所需要的只是计划，路线图，以及朝着目标前进的勇气。
content: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.

title: 危机四伏之时，智者筑桥，愚者设障。
content: But in times of crisis the wise build bridges, while the foolish build barriers.

title: 伟大的事情不是由那些向趋势、流行及大众观点屈服的人完成。
content: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.

title: 只有当你真正感受到对死亡的恐惧，你才会学到要珍惜生命。
content: It’s when you start to become really afraid of death that you learn to appreciate life.
